name: Alice's Real Adventures in Wonderland
description:
Alice's Real Adventures in Wonderland invites the player to be in the interactive world of Wonderland and re-write a unique ending to the story. 

A narrative game. Made with Unity Engine. 

- Engaging dialogues 

- Breaking through the Fourth Wall 

- Freedom to choose and rewrite the plot 

- Changing atmosphere (lighting & color scheme) based on current sanity and health levels 

- Whimsical music

- Stylized character and environment art
